A2748 ama - aman ам(ан) AMA(N) a) n. Mouth; /the mouth as the organ of speech or voice, hence, speech, utterance; the mouth as the means of eating, tasting, etc., hence, a person as a consumer of food or as a unit in census-taking. b) An opening resembling or likened to a mouth; the opening of a cup, muzzle or bore of a rifle, width of a pipe or tube; mountain pass, opening of a gulch or ravine, narrow mountain valley; embouchure. c) Speicial idiomatic usage. -- ama ber jarixu. For all to speak at once. -- asayuxu. To confront with a previous statement -- berBy word of mouth, orally. -- ber zakixu. To command by word of mouth, give oral orders; to communicate orally. -- byle. Number of members in a family or household; family or household as a census unit. -- eryke. Family, household. -- γarxu. To utter a word, say, speak; to promise; to speak evil of, slander. See also b. -- jeketei. Having a big mouth; talking big, bragging. --n deger-e. In words ( an opposed to actions). --n kele. Oral or colloquial language. --n u ajas ijer keleky. To say whatever comes ütto one's head. --n u uran zokijal. Folklore. -- øgky. To give a promise. -- saitai kymyn. Talkative person; a person who likes to say pleasant things. -- suruγ-a edyi mori. A horse which is not yet broken in. -- tataxu. To hold one's tongue; to pull the reins (of a horse). -- uran. Eloquent. -- xaraxu. To wait for what others have to say, wait for orders or directions, lack initiative. -- xataγu. Having a sharp or acid tongue ( of people); hard-mouthed (of horses). -- ygei mori. A tender-mouthed horse. -- xoγusun. Empty words. -- γarxu. For a breach, gap, or passage to open. See also a. --n kyzygyy. The first vertebra of the neck. buu jin --. Muzzle or bore of a gun. jar-a jin . Opening of a wound. -- mølty. Just then, just at the moment when. γarxu gezy baixu du ni mølty dayarilduba. [I] met [him] just when [he] was about to leave. jabuxu jin --n deger-e. Just about to go, on the point of going.

ANU [Originally, the genitive form of the obsolete pronoun a ,they. It has almost completely lost its pronominal meaning, and is used postpositionally to indicate that what precedes it is the syntactical subject of a sentence. It often has the same function as a definite article in English. It is now used interchangeably with inu. In modern texts, ni is used for both anu and inu.]. ailadxaxu anu. T0348 dagagaqu даах DAΓAΓA- v.t. and i. a) Tobe able to carry, bear, or lift. b) To tolerate, withstand. c) To take on a responsibility or charge; to warrant, guarantee, vouch; to insure. d) To cut well, be sharp. --n jadaxu. To be unable to bear, carry, or lift bej-e ben --xu. Tobe able to lift oneself up. See also c. egyrcy --xu. To be able to carry on the back. møsyn --mui. The ice can bear [weight]. alba --xu ygei. To withstand hardships. amin i --xu. To insure life. bej-e ben --xu. To be independent. See also a bej-e degen --xu. To take upon oneself. cerig --xu. To be in command of troops. kymyn i --xu. To vouch for a person. kituγ-a --xu ygei. A knife cannot cut it.

Sound, noise; news, information. -- cøgentei. Taciturn. -- γarγaxu. To produce a sound; compose a song -- γarxu. See duuγarxu. --n u tasulγ-a. Musical rest, musical interval. --n u uxaγan. A lion's roar. boγuni -- Soft or low voice. byzig -- Dancing song. cenggel -- . Cheerful music or song. dour-a -- . Soft or low voice. narin -- . High-pitched voice. nom un -- . Religious song, hymn. øndyr -- . High-pitched voice. sula -- . Weak voice. tngri jin -- . Thunder. xataγu cingγ-a -- . Powerful voice. yge -- ygei. Without further ado; unreservedly, unconditionally, implicitly. yge -- ygei ber. Without saying anything, silent[ly].

T7595 dur -д - -т (after р, г, с, в) DUR - DYR [= du, dy ( after vowels and n, ng, m, l); tur, tyr or tu, ty ( after all other consonants) ] A suffix of the dative-locative case expressing direction: to, in, into; location; at, in, within; time: at the time of, during, while, when; purpose , reason or advantage: for the purpose of, for the reason of, for the benefit of; agent or instrument of a passive verb: by, with; possession ( with the verb "to be" or comitative -tai ). abdar tur oruγulxu. To put in a chest or trunk. araki dur soγtuγsan. Intoxicated with wine. asaγuγsan dur. When asked. bolzimar tur xubilxu. To change into a lark. burxan dur sysygleky. To believe in Buddha. caγasun dur biciky. To write on paper. daisun dur alaγdaxu. To be killed by the enemy. emyne zyg tyr. lnthe south. ene on dur. Within this year. γal dur tylegdeky. To be singed by fire. ger tyr kyrky. To arrive at the house. ger tyr oruxu. To enter a house. idesi dyr keregleky. To useyfor food. jaγun dur. For what reason? Why? kymyn dyr yly yzegdeky. Not to be seen by others. minu baγ-a dur. When I was a child. nigen caγ tur. At one time, once. nøkyr tyr nom øgky. To give a book to a tegyn dyr bajasxu. To rejoice over it. tegyn dyr mønggy bain-a. He has money. tegyn y tuxai dur. For that reason; for his benefit. tere lama dur nom ygei. That lama has no religious training. tere ucir tur. For that reason. usun dur jabuxu. To go after water. usun dur orkixu. To throw into the water. xotan-a iregsen dyr. When he ( etc.) came to the city. zarliγ boluγsan dur. When he spoke or gave a command. . zida dur nebte zidalaγdaxu. To be transfixed by a bayonet.
274

T7598 dur-a - duran дур DUR-A(N) n. Wish, desire, wanting, liking, inclination; volition; arbitrariness; taste, fancy. -- ber. Voluntarily, willingly, zealously, arbitrarily, to one's heart's content, as one likes or pleases. -- ber abxu. To take as one pleases; to take at one's own will, arbitrarily, highhandedly. --ber aγasilaxu. To behave as one pleases. -- ber ijen jabuxu. To act or behave as one pleases. -- ber ijen zangnaxu. To act arbitrarily. -- ber inu talbixu. To let somebody have his own way. -- ber oruγsan cerig. Voluntary troops. -- daruxu. To satisfy a wish or desire. -- dur -a ber. Everyone according to his desire or whim. -- γutuxu. To grieve, be sad or chagrined. -- kødelky. To desire, crave for. -- kyrky. To have or develop a desire. -- meden. According to one's desire, following one's wish or whim, arbitrarily. -- øgky. To give in, yield. -- ygei. Not liking, malcontent, dissatisfied; having no taste for, having an aversion for; unwilling[ly], reluctant[ly]. -- ygei bolxu. To become discontent; to cease to love or like. aman -- ijer. (To speak ) as one pleases, without discrimination or discretion. bi jabuxu -- ygei. I do not want to go. bi tegyn dy -- ygei. I do not like him (her or it) jabuxu -- ygei. [He does] not want to go. øber øber yn -- ber bolγaxu. To leave it to a person's wish, pleasure, or decision. sain --. Free will, voluntariness. sain -- ber. Voluntarily. sain -- jin. Voluntary.

E1258 ece
ECE Suffix of the ablative case with the following functions: a) Separative ablative denoting direction from, moving away from, beginning with, springing from (referring both to space and time). b) Ablative of contact. c) Ablative of cause or reason. d) Partitive ablative ( indicating objects which are only partially affected by the action). e) Exclusive ablative (usually followed by such words as: busu, øger-e, γadana) in constructions corresponding to "besides," "different from," "apart from, " " except," "other than. " f) Comparative ablative. g) Agentive or subjective ablative denoting the actor (actual subject), especially with passive verb forms. h) Objective ablative used with verbs meaning to fear, beg, request. adaγ --. From the end. aru bej -e ece, From behind. dain -- urid. Before or prior to the war. egyn -- abcu yzebesy. If we look ( at it) from this point of view; from this it follows or appears that; thus egyn -- nigen zil yn emyn-e. A year before this. ger -- γarxu. To come out of the house. modun i izaγur -- oγtulxu. To cut down a tree from the root. mongγul -- γaruγsan nigen jasun. A tribe of Mongolian origin. nøgyge tal-a --. On the other hand; from the other side. xaγan u xatun -- nigen kybegyn tørybei A son was born to the khaghants wife. xoin-a -- jabuxu. To follow. xola --. From afar. debel -- tataxu. To pull by the dress. γar -- barixu. To take or seize by the hand. kyzygyn -- teberiky. To embrace. jambar ucir --. On account of what? For what reason? keyked -- ajuxu. To be afraid of children; to be afraid for the children. zirγalang bujan -- bolumui Happiness comes from virtue. zobalang anu nisvanis -- bolumui Suffering comes from attachment to the world. cai -- uruba.. He drank some of the tea. jaγum-a -- ojulcaba. [She] took -part in sewing things. jabuxu -- busu arγ-a ygei There remains nothing but to go. nige -- cegeken busu. Not less than once. tegyn -- γadan-a. Besides that. urid -- øger-e., Differently, other than before. egyn -- sain. Better than this. tegyn -- jeke. Bigger than that. xural -- toγtaγaba, A resolution was passed by the assembly. -- ajuxu. To be afraid of (somebody). -- asaγuxu. To ask (somebody), -- γujuxu. To ask, request.

K0914 kemen
KEMEN mod. conv. of keme-; it has the following special uses: a) Preceding verbs or verbal expressions describing speaking, hoping, intending, planning, etc., it terminates what in English would be direct or indirect speech, between which two there is no distinction in Mongolian. b) Preceding other verbs or expressions it may be translated as: 1. As, in the nature, condition; or capacity of. 2. Because; in order to, for the purpose of. arγ -a ygei -- sedkiky. To think that there is no way out ... ir-e -- zarliγ bolxu. To order to come. nøkyr marγasi iremyi -- kelebei. [My] friend said [he] would come tomorrow. zyitei -- yzeky. To acknowledge or consider as right or correct. beleg -- barixu. To give as a present. kølysy -- nigecy mengyy tegyndyr oldaγsan ygei. He did not receive a single farthing for wages. xaγan -- kyndyleky. To repect as king. bi surγaγuli dur erdem sursuγai -- orubai. I entered school in order to study.

M0076 mandal мандал MANDAL [ S. Mandala, "anything round: disk, circle, orb"] n. Disk, circle, circumference, orb; a pictorial or plastic representation of the universe as conceived in Buddhist cosmography. The center of the mandala circle is usually occupied by the image of a deity, for the most parts a buddha in his palace, forming a square center and surrounded by his retinue (nøkyd). The whole mandala is filled with the pertinent emblems and symbols. It serves the priest in performing the liturgy of evoking the deity ( See bytygel). -- ariγulxu. To purify, perfume with incense, consecrate a temple. -- un sirege. Altar (Lamaist). acilal un -- . "Thanksgiving mandal," in its simplest form it is a metallic disk, often with a small elevation in the center, representing the cosmic Mount Sumeru (see symer). In performing the thanksgiving ritual the priest makes up small piles of fragments of precious stones , metals, etc. , reciting the prescribed text, after which he lifts up the whole as ‘a "cosmic" offering to the Buddha. caγan -- cidxuxu. To pour butter and brandy into the fire as a religious ceremony (performed during daytime). ebydyg yn -- . Knee-cap, patella. γal un --. Buddhist fire offering. kei jin --. Atmosphere. kyilsyn u --. Navel. naran u -- . Sun disk. saran u --. Moon disk. usun u --. Hydrosphere. xar-a -- cidxuxu. The same ceremony as described under caγan -- cidxuxu performed at night.

N1758 nige - nigen нэг
NIGE(N) a) num. and adv. One; the same; once; expresses momentaneous aspect when used before a verb. b) Somebody; something; a certain; any. c) Single in kind, the same; undivided, united d) The first (of the month) -- ber. Alone -- busu. Not one; more than once. -- byri. Each individually. -- caγ. One hour; one o'clock. -- cy. See nigecy. -- dour-a. On the spot, right where one is; together. --(n) dy = nigedyger In the first place, first of all. --n graγ One week --n-e See nigen-e -- nige ber. One by one, one at atime, one after another, each individually, point by point. -- nigen degen. To each other, one another; mutually --sar-a. One month. --n tal-a ber ... nøgyge tal-a ber. On the one hand . . . on the other hand. -- udaγ-a. Once, one time --xarγuitu. Single track -- xaskirxu. To give a shout. ta – yze! Have a look! yneker -- saixan sanaγdaba. Really for once [I] felt very happy. -- Caγ tu. Once upon a time; at one o'clock --n edyr. Some day, one day; once. See c. aliba -- tal-a ber. From all sides or points, from any point of view. alincu --n = alicu --n. Anyone. izaγur -- axa degyy xojar baizu gen-e. Once upon atime there were a certain two brothers. jam[b]ar cu --n. No matter who or what, whosoever, whatsoever zarim --n eteged. Certain persons or elements --[n] adali. The same or identical; of the same kind. similar; equal; together; in the same way. --[n] cuγ. Together --[n] cuγ jabuxu. To go together --[n] daγuu ber. Unanimously, in unison. --[n] deger -Ie . At the same time, simultaneously --[n] edyr. [On] the same day --[n] jangzutai. Similar, identical --[n] majiγ. Similar, identical --[n] mør bolxu. To become uniform. --[n] mør yn. Uniform (adj.). --[n] neretei. Of the same name, namesake --[n] obuγtai. Of one family, of the same family, clan; of the same surname --[n] xamtu. Together, along with; at the same time. tegyn lyge --n adali. The same as that (or he, she it) mai sar-a jin --n y edyr. First of May

U1915 om
OM [s. oṃ = um = om]- A mystical syllable -- mani badm-a hum « nom mani padme hūm," S. usually translated as "Oṃ, Jewel in the Lotus, Hūm," which according to a popular, but erroneous view refers to the Buddha, his Teaching and the Buddhist Clergy. Actually it is an invocation directed to Avalokitecvara, the Bodhisattva ( see BODISADU-A) of compassion. Another explanation applying to the same Bodhisattva is, "Oṃ , the Jewel Lotus Hūm." According to Sanskrit grammar this interpretation would apply to a female deity

U2720 oruqu орох ORU- v. i. a) To enter, go or come into a place, space, substance, state or condition; to penetrate; to be received ( as proceeds, income). b) To yield, give in, obey; to fall under the influence of; to become addicted to; to be dependent on; to be in rut (of animals). c) To hold, have the capacity of ( of a container). d) To enter upon, begin, start; to join; to be included, fall under; to be encompassed. e) To fall, come down. f) To require, take, take in. g) v. aux. When preceded by other verbs indicates direction into. --xui yarxui. Receipts and expenses. --xui anu γarxui dur yly kyrylceky. The income does not cover the expenses. ami --xu. To become alive, revive. erke cilygety baidal dur --xu. To become free ( lit. to enter into state of liberty). ger tyr --xu. To enter a house. kycy --xu. To gather or recover strength; to need strength. nykelen --xu. To undermine ( e. g. a city wall). tamir tengkege --xu. To recover strength, feel stronger or better. tuil un dorui baidal dur --xu. To fall into an extremely miserable state. zam dur --xu. To be on the right track; to get on the‘ road, be on the road to. --γsan temege. Camel in rut. arγan dur --xu. To fall into a trap (fig. ). darulaγdal un dour-a --xu. To come under the oppression of. erken dyr --xu. To come under the influence of. γar tur --xu. To fall into somebody's hands; to come under somebody's influence. sysyg --xu. To embrace a faith, be converted. tegyn y keleky yge minu amin dur --mui. My life depends on what he will say. tere bolbasu minu amin dur --γsan jeke acitai kymyn møn. He is the man to whom I owe my life. ygen dyr --xu. To obey words, be influenced by words; to believe, trust. ene longxu dur xojar zing --mui. This bottle holds two cattles. idezy --xu ygei. To be unable to eat food; cannot eat any more. aman dur --xu = kelen dyr --xu. To start to talk (of children). azil du --xu. To start work. bailduγan-a --xu. To become engaged in a battle kele aman dur --xu. To be involved in an altercation. kereg tyr --xu. To be involved or entangled in a matter or lawsuit. kereg zarγu tu --xu. To be involved in a lawsuit. medege --xu. To begin to understand, notice things; to regain consciousness. sanal --mui. An idea occurs. surγaγuli dur --xu. To enter a school. yn-e -- . To become valuable; to become more expensive. ynyr -- . To begin to smell. boruγ-a --mui = xur-a --mui. It rains. casu --mui. It snows. doyusi --ysan zam. Downhill road. ene azil dur baγ-a daγan γurban kymyn --mui. This work requires at least three persons. dabkizu --xu. To gallop into. xaraizu --xu. To jump into.

S0012 sanag-a - sanagan санаа(н) SANAΓ-A(N) n. a) Thought, thinking, idea, reflection, attention. b) Opinion, conception, sentiment; frame of mind. c) Intention, policy, aim. -- bodulγ-a. To realize one's plans; to do something in one's own way. --n du oruγulxu. To remind; to keep in mind --n dur oruxu. The thought occurs to [me, etc. ]; to remember, recollect --n du ygei. Unintentionally, unexpectedly; being unaware. -- talbixu. To pay attention; to keep in mind. -- tøryky. To conceive an idea. aγuu -- tai. Broad-minded axur -- . Lack of foresight, shortsightedness. caγan -- Clean mind, good mind γoul -- Main idea, principal idea jeke -- tai. Haughty, supercilious, overambitious, having great ambition. maγu -- tai. Evil-minded, ill-willed; suspicious nigen -- ber. Being of one mind, unanimously xar-a -- . Vicious thoughts ynen --n ijen Truly, sincerely, earnestly -- aldaxu. To sigh, moan. -- amur. Having peace of mind; carefree; careless -- amurxu. To be relieved, acquire peace of mind -- ber ijen. At random, as one desires, arbitrarily -- bucaxu. To change one's mind. -- -- ebdereky. To break up (as friendship, cordial relations) --n u dur-a ber Arbitrarily, highhandedly --n u ebedcin. Heartache, heartbreak -- sedkil. Frame of mind, disposition; mind and thought -- sedkil amur ygei. Depressed, worried. -- sedkil aldaxu. To be out of one's mind from grief or disappointment; to be frustrated -- zobaxu. To worry about; to grieve ene jambar -- tai kymyn bei! What is his idea? What is he thinking? ( expressing surprise and disgust). øcyken -- My humble opinion (wish ); small mind sain -- tai. Kind-hearted; well-meaning. sedkil -- . Frame of mind, disposition; thought and mind ujaraxu -- . Languishment, sadness. -- ber bolxu. To be in agreement with one's desire or intention -- ber busu/bisi. Against one's wish, unintentionaly -- edyky, To start or initiate an idea or a plan. -- oruγulxu. To Suggest an idea or plan; To put an idea into someone's head sanaγ-a bodulγ-a Intention, policy

S1650 sar-a - sara - saran сар SAR-A, SARA(N ) (There is a tendency to write sara for the moon and sar-a for the month). n. a) Moon. b) Month. Lunar months are designated by the cardinal numbers so that xojar sar-a is February, γurban sar-a is March, etc. January, however, is caγan sar-a or in formal style terigyn sar-a. The solar months are designated by the ordinal numbers, so that January is nigedyger sar-a, etc. -- barixu. Eclipse of the moon. -- γarxu. The moon rises. -- gkirteky . To be eclipsed (of the moon). --n syke. Moon-shaped hatchet. --n [u] gerel Moonlight --n u xaγucin. Waning of the moon. -- sinedky. The moon waxes. -- tøgyrig. The moon is full. keltegei -- . Crescent. saraγul -- . Clear, shining moon. sin-e -- . New moon. tergel -- . Full moon. xaγucin -- . Waning moon. -- jin belge. Menstruation, menses. -- jin jaγum-a. Menstruation, menses. -- jin sined. First half of the lunar month. -- jin xaγucid. Last half of the lunar month. angxan -- . First month or new moon. baγa -- . Twenty-nine-day month in the lunar calendar. caγan -- . The first month of the year, new year. γaxai -- . Tenth month of the astrological calendar. γurbaduγar -- . The third month, March. γurban -- . March; three months. ilegyy -- . Intercalary month. jeke -- . A thirty-day month in the lunar calendar tabun -- . The fifth month, May tegys -- . Complete month (i.e. month of thirty days, acc. to the old calendar). terigyn -- . First month of each season; January ( formal style). xaruciraγsan -- . Last month. xoitu -- . Next month.

T0004 tai - dai
TAI , 1 - TEI [ cf. tu / ty ] Suffix of the comitative with the following functions: a) It expresses the idea of "together with, in company with" b) It expresses possession, association, or connection with, or means "characterized or qualified by," etc. It is used both attributively and predicatively. In attributive position it is interchangeable with tu/ ty. c) By extension it shows that something is within a container (interchangeable with tu/ty). d) Expresses age after numerals. casu tai boruyan tai xoliyad oruzu bain-a. It is snowing and raining at the same time. ekener tel keyked tei ben jabuzu bain-a. [I, etc.] was going with [my, etc.] wife and children. nada tai ire! Come with me! aziltai edyr. Working day. bi odu keregtei. I have things to do now. ene kymyn olan moritai. This man has many horses moritai kymyn. Horseman, rider of a horse, man with or having a horse ulaγan malaγaitai keyken. T4735 tngri тэнгэр TNGRI [= tenggeri, tegri] n. Heaven; god; sky; weather. -- busu. "Non-gods, " Mythological beings classed between gods and men (S. a-sura T. lha min). -- byrkyky. [That which is] under heaven; world, universe; the [Chinese] Empire (Ch. t'ien-hsia ) . -- jin erkety. The Mighty One of the tengri: Indra. -- jin ezen. The Lord of Heaven, God. -- jin kizaγar. Horizon. -- jin kybegyn. Son of heaven (Ch. t'ien-tzfi , designation of the Chinese emperor) -- jin modun. Deodar (S. devadim, T. lha çing, "tree of the gods "). -- jin orui. Zenith. -- jin orun. Region or abode of the spirits; heaven -- jin sedkil. Will of heaven or god. -- jin tedkygsen. Protected by Heaven, the "style" adopted by the Manchu emperor who ruled China 1736 - 1795 (Ch. ch'ien lung) -- jin tngri. God of gods, the Buddha (S. devātideva, T. lhahi lha ). -- jin vang. Uramis (astron.). -- jin xaγan. King of heaven. -- jin ziruxai. Astronomy. -- ji sysylky jamun. Board of Astronomy of the former Chinese government (Ch. ch'in-t'ien-chien). -- medege ! Cause,reason; circumstance; motive, principle; affair, occasion; meaning of a word; resume, abstract; on account oi, for the reason, in consequence of, as, because; for the purpose of. -- ben keleky. To make a report giving reasons or circumstances. -- i asaγubasu. If one asks the reason why; when one asked the reason; the reason is. -- i γarγaxu. To give a reason. -- ijen medegylky. To state one's case or reason. -- jier. For the sake of, because. -- inu. The reason is that. . . -- i olxu. To realize; to understand; to figure out. -- medeky kymyn. Person who knows the reason; a reasonable man. -- siltaγan u uxaγan. The art of reasoning, logic (obs.). -- toimu ygei. Very, exceedingly. -- udx-a. Meaning, significance. -- ygei. Very, exceedingly. -- ygei aγurlaxu. To be angry without reason; to be very angry. -- ygei xalaγun. Terribly hot. -- zyi. Reason, cause. bi tegyn i buruγusijaγsan -- ygei. I have never blamed him. ene -- tu. For this reason; at this juncture. jaγun[u] -- = jaγun [u] -- ece. For what reason . jambar -- . What is the matter? On what ground? Why? nigen -- boluγsan bui z-a. Surely something has happened.
